snippet: Steve Coburn turned 61 on the day his horse California Chrome won the Kentucky Derby.
abstract: California Chrome wins Kentucky Derby on his co-owner Steve Coburn's 61st birthday; other horse racing news noted.

byline.original: By MELISSA HOPPERT and TOM PEDULLA

lead_paragraph: Steve Coburn turned 61 on the day his horse California Chrome won the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: Derby Winner Gives Co-Owner a Birthday Gift to Remember
headline.print_headline: Winner Gives Co-Owner Birthday Gift to Remember
